creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Marilyn Tupper Doe
description: large temple building with stone steps; silhouetted pines in foreground; full moon URQ; lone silhouetted figure on steps

portfolio: From Twelve Months of Kyoto 京名勝十二月
title: October (The full-moon night at the gate of the Chionin Monastery)
